headline: Tesla’s sales down 40% in EU while Chinese EV maker BYD is up 200% — vindicating Ford CEO's bold statement in June
summary: "We are in a global competition with China," Jim Farley said.

headline: Will LKQ’s (LKQ) New Chairman Shape Its Transformation or Reinforce the Status Quo?
summary: LKQ Corporation has announced that John Mendel was elected Chairman of the Board earlier this month, following Guhan Subramanian's decision to step down from the role and retire from the Board in January 2026. Mendel's extensive experience in automotive and distribution leadership at American Honda, Ford, and Mazda America is viewed as an important factor in the Board’s ongoing efforts to enhance corporate governance practices. We'll explore how Mendel's appointment as Chairman could...

headline: BofA Reiterates Buy Rating on Ford (F) After $2 Billion EV Investment and Platform Launch
summary: Ford Motor Company (NYSE:F) ranks among the best stocks to buy for retirement. Following Ford Motor Company (NYSE:F)’s “Next Model T Moment” event on August 11, BofA Securities reiterated its Buy rating and set a price target of $14 on the company’s shares. Ford announced its Universal Vehicle Platform at the event, emphasizing the benefits […]
